title: OpenAI Upgrades Its Smartest AI Model With Improved Reasoning Skills - WIRED
summary:
OpenAI Upgrades Its Smartest AI Model With Improved Reasoning Skills

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: Wired

OpenAI has announced an upgraded version of its AI model, named o3, which enhances its reasoning capabilities and competes directly with Google's latest model. This upgrade aims to improve performance in complex tasks that require deep logical reasoning.

Key Points:

  • The new model, o3, replaces the previous version, o1, and is designed for improved logical reasoning.
  • OpenAI CEO Sam Altman emphasizes this as the beginning of a new phase in AI capabilities.
  • o3 performs significantly better than o1, particularly in advanced mathematical reasoning and coding tasks.
  • Google has also introduced its reasoning model, Gemini 2.0, intensifying competition in the AI space.
  • OpenAI has implemented a new training technique called deliberative alignment to enhance safety and reliability.
  • The models are currently not publicly available, but testing will be invited for external parties.
“We view this as the beginning of the next phase of AI,” - Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI.
“o3 blew it out of the water,” - Ofir Press, Princeton University.

This breakthrough marks a significant advance in AI technology, with both OpenAI and Google striving for leadership in the field.
newTitle: OpenAI Introduces o3: The Next Generation AI Model with Enhanced Reasoning

title: OpenAI announces new o3 models - TechCrunch
summary:
OpenAI announces new o3 models

Publication Date: December 20, 2024 | Source: TechCrunch

OpenAI has introduced its new o3 models as part of its 12-day 'shipmas' event, marking a significant advancement in AI reasoning technology.

  • The o3 model family includes o3 and o3-mini, a smaller variant tailored for specific tasks.
  • OpenAI claims that o3 can approach artificial general intelligence (AGI) under certain conditions.
  • The launch of o3 and o3-mini is aimed at improving safety in AI model interactions.
  • OpenAI has modified its reasoning process to become more reliable, with enhanced self-verification capabilities.
  • Future previews for o3 are expected, but availability is limited as testing continues.
“o3, our latest reasoning model, is a breakthrough, with a step function improvement on our hardest benchmarks.” — Greg Brockman, OpenAI

The release of o3 signals OpenAI's commitment to advancing safe AI technologies, even as competition in the reasoning model sector increases.
newTitle: OpenAI Unveils New O3 Models to Enhance AI Reasoning Capabilities

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: News18

Apple Maps is enhancing its user experience with the new 'Look Around' feature, enabling 360-degree views similar to Google Street View to help users explore their surroundings more interactively.

  • The 'Look Around' feature is currently rolling out online and has been available on iOS since version 13.
  • It was first made accessible in select cities in the U.S., Canada, Australia, and the EU.
  • Users can activate Look Around by clicking on the binoculars icon on the Maps web app.

title: Steam Gamers Spend Just 15% of Time on New Releases - Slashdot
summary:
Steam Gamers Spend Just 15% of Time on New Releases

Publication Date: 2024

Source: Slashdot

In 2024, Steam users allocated only 15% of their gaming time to newly released titles, marking an increase from 9% in 2023 but a decline from 17% in 2022.

  • 47% of gaming time was attributed to titles released in the past seven years.
  • 37% of playtime was on games older than eight years.
  • New online games like Helldivers 2 and Black Myth: Wukong contributed to the increase in new game engagement.
  • Established games such as Counter-Strike and Dota 2 continued to dominate user engagement.
"Steam users spent only 15% of their total gaming time on new releases in 2024, according to the platform's year-end review."

The trend shows that while new releases are gaining some interest, legacy titles continue to be the main focus for gamers on Steam.
newTitle: Steam Gamers Spend Just 15% of Time on New Releases

The Motorola Moto G35 5G, launched at a price of Rs 9,999 in India, is a budget smartphone that offers vibrant design, decent performance, and a good battery life.

  • Available in three colors: Guava Red, Midnight Black, and Leaf Green.
  • Equipped with a 6.72-inch full HD+ LCD display and supports 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by a 6nm UNISOC T760 processor and houses a 5,000mAh battery.
  • Features an impressive dual-camera setup with a 50MP main camera and an 8MP ultra-wide camera.
  • IP52 rated for water and dust resistance, with Gorilla Glass 3 for screen protection.
  • Offers a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and a 3.5mm audio jack.
"Performance, battery life and photography wise, it is decent; the device fares well compared to others under the Rs 10,000 price range."

Overall, the Motorola Moto G35 5G is a stylish and capable budget smartphone that appeals to users looking for value without sacrificing quality.

OpenAI, Andrew NG Introduce New Course on Reasoning with o1

OpenAI has partnered with DeepLearning.AI to release a new free short course titled ‘Reasoning with o1’. This course aims to help users optimize the capabilities of the advanced o1 model.

  • The course includes training on task identification, prompting techniques, and image understanding.
  • Andrew Ng emphasized the unique approach of o1, which generates reasoning tokens for better accuracy.
  • OpenAI recently announced API access for o1, which is designed for advanced tasks like coding and workflow planning.
  • Ongoing accessibility initiatives by Ng have reached over 7 million learners worldwide.
“Unlike previous language models which generate output directly, o1 thinks before it responds and generates many reasoning tokens before returning a more thoughtful and accurate response.” - Andrew Ng

The launch of the course is part of ongoing efforts to enhance AI education and practical applications.
newTitle: OpenAI and Andrew NG Launch New Reasoning Course on o1

title: Shark Gut Design Enables Valve-Free Pipes for Efficient Fluid Flow, New Study Suggests - Gadgets 360
summary:
Shark Gut Design Enables Valve-Free Pipes for Efficient Fluid Flow

Date: Not provided Source: Gadgets 360

Pipes designed to enable one-way liquid flow without the use of valves have been developed, drawing inspiration from the intestinal structure of sharks. Researchers at the University of Washington have created tubes featuring an internal helix, which mimics the corkscrew-shaped intestines found in sharks, potentially paving the way for more durable fluid transport systems.

Key Points

  • The design eliminates the need for traditional valves, enhancing durability.
  • 3D-printed tubes were tested for efficiency in promoting one-way movement of liquids.
  • Downward-facing helix tubes flow two to three times faster than upward-facing ones.
  • Flexible tubes showed even greater increases in flow speed, up to 15 times faster.
  • Potential applications include drainage systems and air-flow mechanisms.

Notable Quotes

“These findings underscore how observations from nature can inspire innovative solutions to common technical challenges.” – Sarah Keller

Conclusion

Further exploration is anticipated to unlock additional uses for these innovative systems designed after natural models, catering to critical applications in engineering.
newTitle: Shark Gut Design Enables Valve-Free Pipes for Efficient Fluid Flow

title: Beyond smartphones: ChatGPT now available on landlines (and WhatsApp) - TechSpot
summary:
Beyond smartphones: ChatGPT now available on landlines (and WhatsApp)

Publication Date: December 18, 2024 Source: TechSpot

OpenAI is extending its ChatGPT service to landline phones and WhatsApp, aiming to make AI accessible to more users.

  • OpenAI has launched a landline service for ChatGPT, accessible through 1-800-ChatGPT.
  • Users can now engage with ChatGPT via voice calls with a free 15-minute duration.
  • WhatsApp integration is also available, providing text-based interactions without a separate account.
  • Limitations include daily usage caps and no group chat support for WhatsApp.
  • Future enhancements for both services, including image analysis and web search, are expected.
“The team built this just a few weeks ago, and we loved it, and they hustled really hard to ship it, and it's awesome to see it here.” – Kevin Weil, OpenAI chief product officer

This new accessibility aims to include those without smartphones in a rapidly digitalizing world.
newTitle: Beyond smartphones: ChatGPT now available on landlines (and WhatsApp)

title: Apple and NVIDIA partner to boost AI language models’ speed and efficiency - The Financial Express
summary:
Apple and NVIDIA partner to boost AI language models’ speed and efficiency

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Financial Express

Apple has announced a groundbreaking partnership with NVIDIA to enhance the performance of large language models (LLMs). This collaboration will lead to faster and more efficient AI applications across various industries.

  • Introduction of a new text generation technique that greatly increases AI application speed.
  • Integration of Apple's Recurrent Drafter (ReDrafter) with NVIDIA's TensorRT-LLM framework.
  • Reported 2.7x increase in speed for generating tokens in production models.
  • Improved efficiency reduces GPU usage and power consumption for large-scale AI tasks.
  • Access to detailed documentation for developers interested in leveraging ReDrafter.
“This integration is a big step forward for LLMs, crucial for businesses relying on real-time services.”

The partnership between Apple and NVIDIA is a significant advancement in AI technology, promising improved processing speed and efficiency for developers and businesses alike.
newTitle: Apple and NVIDIA Collaborate to Enhance AI Language Models

title: How to use ChatGPT on WhatsApp - India Today
summary:
How to use ChatGPT on WhatsApp

Published On: Dec 20, 2024 | Source: Aman rashid

OpenAI’s ChatGPT is now accessible on WhatsApp, providing a convenient way for users to engage with the AI chatbot through a familiar platform. This article outlines the steps to use ChatGPT easily and what to expect from this integration.

  • ChatGPT can now be accessed directly through WhatsApp.
  • Users must scan a QR code to initiate the chat.
  • The official ChatGPT account can be verified by a blue badge and a specific phone number.
  • Interaction with ChatGPT is user-friendly and immediate.
  • There are daily limits on messages for users.
  • The WhatsApp version runs on a minimized GPT-4o model.
“Using ChatGPT on WhatsApp is as straightforward as chatting with a friend.”

This integration is a game-changer for casual users looking to explore AI without the need for a separate app.
newTitle: Using ChatGPT on WhatsApp: A Simple Guide
